thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 02 May 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Matador Resources Q1 GAAP Earnings Per Share $0.55

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Matador Resources Q1 GAAP Earnings Per Share $0.55
text:
May 2 (Reuters) - Matador Resources Co:
* MATADOR RESOURCES REPORTS FIRST QUARTER 2018 RESULTS AND PROVIDES OPERATIONAL UPDATE
* Q1 ADJUSTED NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.36
* Q1 GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.55 * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.33 â€” THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* Q1 2018 AVERAGE DAILY OIL EQUIVALENT PRODUCTION INCREASED 4% SEQUENTIALLY TO 45,300 BOE PER DAY AS COMPARED TO Q4 2017
* QTRLY AVERAGE DAILY OIL PRODUCTION INCREASED 7% SEQUENTIALLY TO 26,500 BARRELS PER DAY
* SEES AVERAGE DAILY OIL PRODUCTION AND AVERAGE DAILY NATURAL GAS PRODUCTION TO INCREASE ABOUT 3 TO 4% IN Q2 VERSUS Q1 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
